starbucks.search: Just as with the WEST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here.
starbucks.look: Sunken eyes and gaping uncovered mouth... if only you had some way to cover their mouth AND nose...

discount bin.flavorText:
Like every other Socio-Capitalist big-box store this one, your favorite pre-Dovic 
because of its selection of free-range EMU eggs, has a selection of DVD’s that   
would cost more to throw away than they’re worth.  Weather-damaged signs proclaim 
‘28 copies of 28 Days Later, now just $2.89’ 

  That’s actually cheap! You consider  
SEARCHing through the bin to see what could be hidden under the pile of unclaimed 
DVD’s about people who didn’t take pandemics seriously enough.  Or you could  
continue on your way NORTH/EAST/SOUTH, never knowing the glory of - whoops, 
almost gave it away!
discount bin.search: Underneath all the oddly apropos Zombie flicks there's clearly room for something to be hidden...
discount bin.look:
To your disgust you find $5.99 DVD's of Season 4 of 'The Walking Dead'. 
No respectable survivalest would be caught dead with those.

gun store.flavorText: Left by yourself in the wild, ....
gun store.search: Just as with the EAST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here...
gun store.look:
Good choice, always perform a 5-point room scan, and don’t forget to double-tap. 
You see a shimmering slippery substance trailing deeper into the store that ends in a pool near you.  
Divoc Zombies are likely in the store.

east entrance.flavorText:
Somehow inevitably, a shuffling shadow blocks your path.  The 
gruesome smell of entitlement thickens the air around you and the one thing all Divoc 
Zombies can still say changes from a mumble to screech as it sees you: 

‘You can’t 
make me wear a mask!’  

There’s no time to rush past it.  You are already in combat.  You best FIGHT!
east entrance.search: Just as with the WEST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here.
east entrance.look: Sunken eyes and gaping uncovered mouth... if only you had some way to cover their mouth AND nose...

restaurant.flavorText: Your stomach grumbles, you smell tacos at a nearby mexican restaurant. You decide to go purchase some food and recoup some of that lost energy
restaurant.search: Just as with the EAST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here...
restaurant.look:
Good choice, always perform a 5-point room scan, and don’t forget to double-tap. 
You see a shimmering slippery substance trailing deeper into the store that ends in a pool near you.  
Divoc Zombies are likely in the store.

pharmacy.flavorText:
Slim pickings in the Pharmacy. Oddly the Midol is locked up and untouched, which  
makes no sense since its just ibuprofen and caffeine, but people are weird - even  
before being turned into Divoc Zombies.  Since you’re here you might as well     
LOOK around.
pharmacy.search: Some listerine sparkles in the shadow of the mostly empty shelving, and there may be something else there...
pharmacy.look: You see some multi-colored loofas and realize you haven't showered since this all started... months ago..

parking lot 2.flavorText: CONGRATULATIONS! Oops.. not yet. You have one last battle remaining before collecting your rewards.
parking lot 2.search: Just as with the WEST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here.
parking lot 2.look: Sunken eyes and gaping uncovered mouth... if only you had some way to cover their mouth AND nose...

gas station.flavorText: CONGRATULATIONS! Oops.. not yet. You have one last battle remaining before collecting your rewards.
gas station.search: Just as with the WEST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here.
gas station.look: Sunken eyes and gaping uncovered mouth... if only you had some way to cover their mouth AND nose...

west entrance.flavorText:
A torrent of air billows out around you as your bare feet pad their way past the still 
functioning automatic sliding doors.  Though some daylight still speckles the sky, dusk 
is approaching and any normal store in Capitalist RusUsa would have a flood of lights 
on specifically tuned to encourage your support of the oligarchinaires money vaults.  
No such luck today.  

  Despite the lack of light you can make out your two goals for 
entering the store.  Forward and to your NORTH is the pharmacy while forward and to  
your SOUTH is sporting goods.  Your immediate surroundings, the WEST ENTRANCE, 
seems picked bare of anything useful, but you can continue EAST and 
SEARCH the DISCOUNT BIN… if you dare!  (Note, there’s literally nothing daring  
about this, it just seemed like the right thing to say at this particular time.  We  
apologize for insinuating anything dangerous would happen.  Trust us, its safe…  
for now… #sorrynotsorry)
west entrance.search: Just as with the EAST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here...
west entrance.look:
Good choice, always perform a 5-point room scan, and don’t forget to double-tap. 
You see a shimmering slippery substance trailing deeper into the store that ends in a pool near you.  
Divoc Zombies are likely in the store.

sporting goods.flavorText:
This is it, this is what you’ve been… looking… for? There’s literally nothing here.  Way 
too many people watched Zombie movies based on the human blood coating the 
‘Crossbows’ sign.  There are some NERF DARTS scattered about, and there’s 
something MODIFIED about them.
sporting goods.look: Behind the glass counter is a sign that reads 'Yes, you must wear a mask to buy a gun' and 'NO, you do not need to show your face to finalize the purchase #murica'

restroom.flavorText: time to answer the nature's call....
restroom.search: Just as with the WEST entrance, the area just inside the store has been picked clean by looters. Nothing useful here.
restroom.look: Sunken eyes and gaping uncovered mouth... if only you had some way to cover their mouth AND nose...
